mapper.sql: select lease_id, user_name, phone, identity_card, unit_leader, place, give_back, create_time, update_time from lease
mapper.select: SELECT lease.lease_id, lease.user_name, lease.phone, lease.identity_card, lease.unit_leader, lease.place, lease.give_back, lease.create_time, lease.update_time, lease_details.lease_details_id, lease_details.equipment_code, lease_details.equipment_type, lease_details.`status`, lease_details.username, lease_details.phone, lease_details.cash_pledge, lease_details.create_time FROM lease INNER JOIN lease_details ON lease.lease_id = lease_details.lease_id where lease.lease_id = #{leaseId}

SELECT lease.lease_id, lease.user_name, lease.phone, lease.identity_card, lease.unit_leader, lease.place, lease.give_back, lease.create_time, lease.update_time, lease_details.lease_details_id, lease_details.equipment_code, lease_details.equipment_type, lease_details.`status`, lease_details.username, lease_details.phone, lease_details.cash_pledge, lease_details.create_time FROM lease INNER JOIN lease_details ON lease.lease_id = lease_details.lease_id where lease.give_back= '0' and lease_details.`status` = '0' and lease_details.equipment_type = #{equipmentType}

SELECT lease.lease_id, lease.user_name, lease.phone, lease.identity_card, lease.unit_leader, lease.place, lease.give_back, lease.create_time, lease.update_time, lease_details.lease_details_id, lease_details.equipment_code, lease_details.equipment_type, lease_details.`status`, lease_details.username, lease_details.phone, lease_details.cash_pledge, lease_details.create_time FROM lease INNER JOIN lease_details ON lease.lease_id = lease_details.lease_id where lease.give_back= '0' and lease_details.`status` = '1' and lease_details.phone = #{phone}
